These tutorials provide in-depth coverage of Elmfire.jl's features with practical examples.

## Basic Tutorials

- **[Basic Simulation](basic-simulation.qmd)** - Core simulation concepts and API
- **[Weather Effects](weather-effects.qmd)** - Wind, moisture, and time-varying weather
- **[Terrain Effects](terrain-effects.qmd)** - Slope, aspect, and topographic influence

## Advanced Fire Behavior

- **[Crown Fire](crown-fire.qmd)** - Passive and active crown fire modeling
- **[Spotting](spotting.qmd)** - Ember generation and transport

## Operational Features

- **[Ensemble Simulations](ensemble.qmd)** - Monte Carlo probabilistic forecasting
- **[WUI Modeling](wui.qmd)** - Wildland-urban interface and building ignition
- **[Suppression](suppression.qmd)** - Fire containment and resource management

## Prerequisites

All tutorials assume you have Elmfire.jl installed:

```julia
using Pkg
Pkg.add("Elmfire")
```

And the following packages for visualization:

```julia
Pkg.add("Plots")
```
